tool_description: A simple and quick web tool that allows you to retrieve data from both the Old and New Testament based on a book, chapter, or verse. The API provides access to the New International Version (NIV) of the Holy Bible, which is one of the most widely-used translations in the English language.

api_list.name: GetSingleVerse
api_list.description: Retrieve a single verse based on the specified book, chapter, and verse number.

required_parameters.name: Chapter
required_parameters.description: The chapter number to retrieve the verse from.

required_parameters.name: Book
required_parameters.description: The name of the book in the Bible.
